name: David Ramirez
text: Mon semi-gift/ loaned one to me. I just looked because I want to see how much time it takes to make a fairly super character that has strong attack, decent magic, the skill to conserve weapons uses, and the skill for an extra move if you kill someone that turn.

source_obj.text: Mon semi-gift/ loaned one to me. I just looked because I want to see how much time it takes to make a fairly super character that has strong attack, decent magic, the skill to conserve weapons uses, and the skill for an extra move if you kill someone that turn.
